snippet: Mr. Forma profiled nearly two dozen artists on “Artists at Work,” a series of television programs. Some of his films were screened at museums.
abstract: Warren Forma, documentary filmmaker who filmed Artists at Work for television, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Forma profiled nearly two dozen artists on “Artists at Work,” a series of television programs. Some of his films were screened at museums.

headline.main: Warren Forma, Documentary Filmmaker, Is Dead at 90
headline.print_headline: Warren Forma, 90, Who Filmed ‘Artists at Work’ for TV
